attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Prime Minister to resign. We believe that his credibility has been undermined and find his proposed legislative programme unconvincing. We ask him to resign as Prime Minister with immediate effect in the interest of the country.

rejection.details: A petition already exists with this aim
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
